price: 11.Tokkel gablah addal kaxxa xiiniy aytiita xongolo keenik edde aabbe wayya hayta keenil qidne, maggo liggidittey ixxi как yimixxige edde sugen.
arabic: فَضَرَبۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ فِي ٱلۡكَهۡفِ سِنِينَ عَدَدٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: faḍarabnā ʿalā ādhānihim fī al-kahfi sinīna ʿadadan
